name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PuritySight: Explicit, NSFW and porn content blocker

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension uses AI technology to block porn sites and hide erotic content, helping you stay focused and productive

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Protect yourself from NSFW content!

Inspired by the NoFap community, our extension uses cutting-edge AI technology to block porn sites and hide erotic content, helping you stay focused and productive.

PuritySight goes beyond traditional filtering methods, using machine learning algorithms to identify and block explicit content in real-time. Our app updates its filters to ensure that you're protected from the latest online threats. Plus, our AI technology is incredibly accurate, minimizing false positives and ensuring that you can access the content you need without interruptions.

But PuritySight isn't just about blocking content. Our app is designed to help you cultivate healthy online habits and improve your mental clarity. By limiting your exposure to explicit material, PuritySight promotes a cleaner and more focused online experience.

Don't let pornography and 18+ content hold you back any longer. Install PuritySight today and start enjoying a cleaner, more focused online experience!


Permissions:
*  activeTab - to get your current url
*  declarativeNetRequest - to block NSFW pages
*  scripting - to detect and block sensetive content


Icon reference: https://www.flaticon.com/free-icons/strength
